availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary B. Roach Martin in Mercer County on June 21, 1843. Father of William H. Martin, George P. Martin, James T. Martin, Minerva J. Martin, Susan M. Martin, Robert S. Martin, John H. Martin, Belinda J. Martin, and David A. Martin. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 81.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191858.
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #XXXXXXXX, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/ (accessed March 3, 2017).
